response:
Welcome!!!
Hi guys,
This is a cool AngularJS and Node.js based application - a simple contacts application.
You can search, add, edit contacts (based on mock data, there isn't DB avaiable).
Check out my Linkdin and github.
Have fun and stay awesome:)
